name: Berry Simple
description:
A tiny bit of sweetener is recommended, it really makes the strawberry noticeable on the exhale. For those without blackberry, GET IT. But even without, it's still pretty tasty/

Edit 9-17-18  Dropped 4% Vanilla Swirl in favor of the Holy Vanilla. Give this 2 weeks in the dark, becomes very full and creamy.
author: coop34

reviews.text: I tried this about a month ago, and it's been my ADV ever since. I love the mouthfeel. This is such a satisfying berry mix!

I mixed this up on the chance it would blow my mind - Coop has a way of doing that. It didn't, but it's a perfectly pleasant and super smooth, thick berry blend that illustrates perfectly how to work with the sadly underused and often unfairly maligned TFA Blackberry.
